Tipene Funerals scandal: Fiona Bakulich investigation includes 10 bodies disinterred from Waikumete Cemetery https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tipene-funerals-scandal-fiona-bakulich-investigation-includes-10-bodies-disinterred-from-waikumete-cemetery/W5D5GQBHVJD5TH7EP42JKRI26I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tipene-funerals-scandal-fiona-bakulich-investigation-includes-10-bodies-disinterred-from-waikumete-cemetery/W5D5GQBHVJD5TH7EP42JKRI26I/ Raphael FranksBakulich, featured on reality TV show The Casketeers, to appear in court again on Friday. Photos / Michael Craig, Dean Purcell
